fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Regulation 1169/2011, Regulation on official controls (2013/0140(COD)), regulation EG 517/2014, REFIT Claims direction. EU Platform on Food losses and Waste
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: CBL is an active member of EuroCommerce.
goals__remit:
The Dutch Food Retail Association represents the Dutch supermarket organisations and food service companies. CBL represents members on all non-commercial issues such as food safety, sustainability, health issues, crime/theft, logistics and staff-training. 
 
CBL has 27 members which includes almost 4300 stores and 300.000 employees.
